modules.title: What Is Citizenship? (Global View)
modules.instructions: Define citizenship, list two ways it’s acquired, and explain how rights/duties differ across governments.

quiz.q: Define autocracy, oligarchy, democracy, and republic in one sentence each.
quiz.a: Autocracy: power in one; Oligarchy: power in few; Democracy: rule by people/majority; Republic: elected reps with limited government protecting rights.
